FREE MOBILE RECHARGE* : haan yaar hojyga,maine aaj 2 baar kiya hai yaar,signup karte hi 20 Rs ka instant free recharge karlena.

NOTE DOWN karlo PROCEDURE ON NOTEBOOK to Recharge free Recharge your mobile no. online for free 

Step 1 : Just go to http://ultoo.com/login.php?refererCode=121711E&flag=hide

Step 2 : signup using referer code = 121711E

Step 3 : After complete signup,just login and recharge after reaching minimum balance. 

Step 4 : copy & paste this on 5 different comments within 15 minutes of login and recharge.

I got mine 2 times today of Rs 30 and Rs 55. . . . . .and getting Rs 30 + daily. . . .maine parso se ab tak total 235 Rs ka kar lia. . .ye sahi mein kaam karta h. . .and tum iske thru free sms b bhej skte ho. . .
